label: 村上武吉
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: (1533-1604) A maritime baron...who ruled his fleets from an elaborate fortress located on the island of Noshima in Iyo Province (now Miyakubo-chō, Ehime Prefecture), at one of the narrowest but busiest straits of the Inland Sea (p. 263). [能島、伊予、愛媛県宮窪町]
